name: Small Scientist
description:
This game is about a young innovative scientists that wanted to end world hunger with a food growth potion but something went wrong and there was an explosion. The explosion had made her shrink, dust piles to become hostile, and water to have a mind of its own and there was loads of water in that experiment. To get back to normal you will have to find small test tubes of ingredients scattered around your room and  mix them all together to make another explosion and get back to normal. 

The controls:

arrow keys to move

Z to attack

C to collect

game created by: Ryan Weekes, Simon Blackwood and Jasmine Smith
